00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value

00030 /**
00031  * TYPO3 class manager
00032  * 
00033  * This class will handle every request to a class that belongs to a registered
00034  * prefix, by automatically loading the class file (thanx to the SPL).
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 final class tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * The unique instance of the class (singleton)
00045      */
00046     private static $_instance = NULL;
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * The loaded classes from this TYPO3
00050      */
00051     private $_loadedClasses   = array();
00052     
00053     /**
00054      * The path from which to load classes
00055      */
00056     private $_classDirs       = array();
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * Class constructor
00060      * 
00061      * The class constructor is private to avoid multiple instances of the
00062      * class (singleton).
00063      * 
00064      * @return NULL
00065      */
00066     private function __construct()
00067     {}
00068     
00069     /**
00070      * Clones an instance of the class
00071      * 
00072      * A call to this method will produce an exception, as the class cannot
00073      * be cloned (singleton).
00074      * 
00075      * @return  NULL
00076      * @throws  tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception Always, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton)
00077      */
00078     public function __clone()
00079     {
00080         throw new tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception(
00081             'Class ' . __CLASS__ . ' cannot be cloned',
00082             tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception::EXCEPTION_CLONE
00083         );
00084     }
00085     
00086     /**
00087      * Gets the unique class instance
00088      * 
00089      * This method is used to get the unique instance of the class
00090      * (singleton). If no instance is available, it will create it.
00091      * 
00092      * @return  tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager   The unique instance of the class
00093      */
00094     public static function getInstance()
00095     {
00096         // Checks if the unique instance already exists
00097         if( !is_object( self::$_instance ) ) {
00098             
00099             // Creates the unique instance
00100             self::$_instance = new self();
00101         }
00102         
00103         // Returns the unique instance
00104         return self::$_instance;
00105     }
00106     
00107     /**
00108      * SPL autoload method
00109      * 
00110      * When registered with the spl_autoload_register() function, this method
00111      * will be called each time a class cannot be found, and will try to
00112      * load it.
00113      * 
00114      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00115      * @return  boolean
00116      * @see     getInstance
00117      * @see     _loadClass
00118      */
00119     public static function autoLoad( $className )
00120     {
00121         // Instance of this class
00122         static $instance = NULL;
00123         
00124         // Checks if the instance of the class has already been fetched
00125         if( !is_object( $instance ) ) {
00126             
00127             // Gets the instance of this class
00128             $instance = self::getInstance();
00129         }
00130         
00131         // Process each registered prefix
00132         foreach( $instance->_classDirs as $prefix => $path ) {
00133         
00134             // Checks if the requested class belongs to a registered prefix
00135             if( strpos( $className, $prefix ) === 0 ) {
00136                 
00137                 // Tries to load the requested class
00138                 $instance->_loadClass( $className, $instance->_classDirs[ $prefix ] );
00139             }
00140         }
00141         
00142         // The requested class does not belong to a registered prefix
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145     
00146     /**
00147      * Loads a class from a TYPO3 directory
00148      * 
00149      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00150      * @param   string  The directory in which the class is supposed to be
00151      * @return  boolean
00152      */
00153     private function _loadClass( $className, $directory )
00154     {
00155         // Gets the class path
00156         $classPath = $directory . 'class.' . strtolower( $className ) . '.php';
00157         
00158         // Checks if the class file exists
00159         if( file_exists( $classPath ) ) {
00160             
00161             // Includes the class file
00162             require_once( $classPath );
00163             
00164             // Checks if the requested class is defined in the included file
00165             if( !class_exists( $className ) ) {
00166                 
00167                 // Error message
00168                 $errorMsg = 'The class '
00169                           . $className
00170                           . ' is not defined in file '
00171                           . $classPath;
00172                 
00173                 // The class is not defined
00174                 trigger_error( $errorMsg, E_USER_ERROR );
00175             }
00176             
00177             // Adds the class to the loaded classes array
00178             $this->_loadedClasses[ $className ] = $classPath;
00179             
00180             // Class was successfully loaded
00181             return true;
00182         }
00183         
00184         // Class file was not found
00185         return false;
00186     }
00187     
00188     /**
00189      * 
00190      */
00191     public function registerClassDir( $prefix, $path )
00192     {
00193         if( isset( $this->_classDirs[ $prefix ] ) ) {
00194             
00195             throw new tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager_Exception(
00196                 'The requested prefix (' . $prefix . ') is already registered.',
00197                 tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager_Exception::EXCEPTION_PREFIX_EXISTS
00198             );
00199         }
00200         
00201         if( !file_exists( $path ) || !is_dir( $path ) ) {
00202             
00203             throw new tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager_Exception(
00204                 'The requested directory (' . $path . ') does not exist.',
00205                 tx_oop_Typo3_ClassManager_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_DIRECTORY
00206             );
00207         }
00208         
00209         $this->_classDirs[ $prefix ] = $path;
00210     }
00211     
00212     /**
00213      * Gets the loaded classes
00214      * 
00215      * @return  array   An array with the loaded classes
00216      */
00217     public function getLoadedClasses()
00218     {
00219         // Returns the loaded classes
00220         return $this->_loadedClasses;
00221     }
00222 }
